wikipedia_page.main: Jawahir Roble also known as Jawahir Jewels or JJ is a Somali-born British football referee. The Daily Telegraph has called her "the most remarkable referee in England". She herself has said, "Who would ever think a black, Somali-born immigrant girl with eight siblings could ref a men’s game in England with a hijab on?".

response: * Jawahir Roble, Somali-born British football referee
| || Jawahir Roble ||  || UK's first Muslim, black, female, hijab-wearing referee
